Name: Abe Stark Rink
Location: Coney Island Boardwalk and West 19th Street
Holiday_Public_Skating_Hours: The rink will be open from noon to 4:00 p.m. on Thursday, December 26 through Wednesday, January 1, 2020.
Notes: All information subject to change; please call ahead for details. All skaters must sign a Risk of Ice Skating/Hockey Activity Agreement. Persons under 18 years of age must have written consent form signed by parent or guardian. Agreement forms available at rink. A parent must sign the agreement form in the presence of a rink employee or parents signature must be notarized. No exceptions.

Name: LeFrak Center at Lakeside
Public_Skate_Admission_Price_Adult: $7.50; $11 on weekends. Weekend pricing begins on Fridays at 4:00 p.m.
Public_Skate_Admission_Price_Child: $7.50; $11 on weekends. Weekend pricing begins on Fridays at 4:00 p.m.
Public_Skate_Admission_Price_Senior: $7.50; $11 on weekends. Weekend pricing begins on Fridays at 4:00 p.m.
Notes: For updates and more information about programming at the rink, please visit LeFrak Center at Lakeside's website.

Name: The Rink at Bryant Park
Public_Skate_Admission_Price_Adult: Free (if you bring your own skates)
Public_Skate_Admission_Price_Child: Free (if you bring your own skates)
Public_Skate_Admission_Price_Senior: Free (if you bring your own skates)
Skate_Rental_Cost: $21-$36. Skate rental prices vary by date and can be found by visiting The Rink at Bryant Park page. All skate rentals come with a drawstring shoe bag to hold shoes. Skate aid rental is $22.
Locker_Information:
There are no locks or lockers this year (part of The Rink's COVID-19 safety protocols). Bag check for larger items is $15.

If you bring your own skates, drawstring shoe bags can be purchased for $5 or you can bring your own drawstring bag no larger than 16”x18”. Larger items must be checked at bag check prior to skate time.
Holiday_Public_Skating_Hours: From Thanksgiving Day (Nov. 26) until January 3, 2021, The Rink stays open one hour later, 8:00 a.m. – 11:00 p.m.
Programming: Please visit The Rink at Bryant Park page for more information.
Notes:
Advance online booking required for all skaters, including skaters with their own skates. Skaters and chaperones must wear face coverings over their noses and mouths for the duration of their visit to The Rink, both on the ice and adjacent areas. For more information about safety protocols at The Rink, please visit The Rink at Bryant Park's website.

Helmet rental - $6; Socks - $6; skate sharpening - $20

Name: Lasker Rink
Location: Entrance just south of park entrance at 110th Street & Lenox Avenue.
Locker_Information: Lockers are not available. Personal items must be stored neatly inside a personal bag and must be kept with you at all times.
Holiday_Public_Skating_Hours: Please visit Lasker Rink's website for updated holiday hours.
Programming: Please visit Lasker Rink's website for programming information.

Name: Wollman Rink
Locker_Information:
$5.00 + $6.00 deposit
(Deposit will be returned to the customer after lock is returned.)
Holiday_Public_Skating_Hours: Please visit Wollman Rink's website for holiday hours.

Name: WWII Veterans War Memorial Ice Skating Rink
Location:
Victory Blvd., west of Clove Rd.

This ice skating rink is currently closed and will re-open for the 2020-21 season on Saturday, November 21, 2020.
Skate_Rental_Cost: $5.00. The health and safety of the public is our number one priority. Rental skates are cleaned and disinfected after every use.
Holiday_Public_Skating_Hours: The rink will be open to the public on a Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, or Thursday if a public school holiday falls on those days. Please call the rink at (718) 720-1010 for holiday hours.
Notes:
The rink also offers a comfortable snack bar where skaters can relax between turns on the ice.

Persons under 18 years of age must have a written consent form signed by a parent or guardian. Agreement forms are available at the rink. A parent must sign the agreement form in the presence of a rink employee or the parent's signature must be notarized. No exceptions.

Please call (718) 720-1010 before heading to the rink.

Hand sanitizer is available throughout the facility.

Name: World Ice Arena
Skate_Rental_Cost: $6.00/person. You must wear socks to rent skates.
Locker_Information: Coin-operated lockers are available for rent ($0.75 per use).
Holiday_Public_Skating_Hours: For holiday public skating hours, please visit worldice.com for more information.
Programming: Please see the World Ice Arena website for details on Learn to Skate, hockey, and freestyle skate programming.
Notes: World Ice Arena is a year-round ice skating rink. The facility is Sled Hockey Accessible.
